projectDesc: Welcome to Food4Paws! Explore our pet paradise online. Shop treats, toys, and more, with easy sorting and searching. Enjoy secure payments via Razor Pay. Responsive and user-friendly, our site is powered by React Native for seamless browsing on any device. Shop now for all your pet's needs!

Shop smart for your pets today!

Image Formatter website powered by Flask and OpenCV. Instantly transform your images using a range of dynamic features. From converting to grayscale and optimizing formats like JPEG, PNG, and WebP, to real-time previews
